bookinfo.title: &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE &THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor User Guide

abstract.para: &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE &THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor (RA) is the JAIN SLEE 1.1 RA for the LTE S6a Interface. S6a reference point is used for location changes of the Mobility Management Entity (MME), enabling the transfer of subscriber related data between the MME and the Home Subscriber Server (HSS). It is described in TS29.272 by 3GPP.
This RA implements the Resource Adaptor Type defined by Mobicents development teams.
